import Class

Defined in: lib/api/import.js:4
Module: import
Parent Module: arango

The api module to import data into ArangoDB.

  • Index
  • Methods

Item Index

Methods

  • importJSONData
  • importValueList

Methods

importJSONData

(
  • [collection]
  • documents
  • [options]
  • callback
)
Promise

Defined in lib/api/import.js:16

Imports data from a JSON Object.

Parameters:

  • [collection] String optional
    • The collection containing the documents.If not provided the collection defined in the connection is used.
  • documents Object
    • The data to import, can either be one single JSON Object containing a list of documents or a list of JSON Objects seperated ny new lines.
  • [options] Object optional
    • a JSON Object containting the following optional parameters:
    • [createCollection=false] Object optional
      • If true, the collection will be created if it doesn't exist.
    • [waitForSync=false] Object optional
      • Wait until documents have been synced to disk before returning.
    • [complete=false] Object optional
      • If set to true, it will make the whole import fail if any error occurs.
    • [details=false] Object optional
      • If set to true or yes, the result will include an attribute details with details about documents that could not be imported.
  • callback Function
    • The callback function.

Returns:

Promise:

importValueList

(
  • [collection]
  • documents
  • [options]
  • callback
)
Promise

Defined in lib/api/import.js:58

Parameters:

  • [collection] String optional
    • The collection containing the documents.If not provided the collection defined in the connection is used.
  • documents Object
    • The data to import, The first line of the request body must contain a JSON-encoded list of attribute names. All following lines in the request body must contain JSON-encoded lists of attribute values. Each line is interpreted as a separate document, and the values specified will be mapped to the list of attribute names specified in the first header line.
  • [options] Object optional
    • a JSON Object containting the following optional parameters:
    • [createCollection=false] Object optional
      • If true, the collection will be created if it doesn't exist.
    • [waitForSync=false] Object optional
      • Wait until documents have been synced to disk before returning.
    • [complete=false] Object optional
      • If set to true, it will make the whole import fail if any error occurs.
    • [details=false] Object optional
      • If set to true or yes, the result will include an attribute details with details about documents that could not be imported.
  • callback Function
    • The callback function.

Returns:

Promise:
